projects.name: AI Shop Assistant Chatbot
projects.description: Built an intelligent e-commerce assistant that combines GPT-4o with semantic search via Pinecone and OpenAI embeddings to deliver context-aware product recommendations and pricing insights. The system integrates MySQL with a vector database for hybrid retrieval, achieving sub-second responses across 100+ catalog items.
highlights: Hybrid retrieval combining SQL and vector search

projects.name: CreditPredictor: ML-Based Credit Risk Classification
projects.tagline: End-to-end ML pipeline for credit risk
projects.description: Designed a comprehensive machine learning pipeline to forecast credit card default risk using payment history features. Achieved 85% accuracy and AUC 0.95 with XGBoost. The system automates data ingestion, validation, preprocessing, clustering, and hyperparameter optimization. Deployed on AWS EC2 via Flask API with 99.9% uptime.

projects.name: AdClickOptimizer: Predictive System for Ad CTR
projects.tagline: ML models for ad click-through rate prediction
projects.description: Developed machine learning models (Random Forest, Logistic Regression) with 96% accuracy for predicting ad click-through rates. Improved performance by 10% through time-based feature engineering and statistical analysis. Launched a Flask web app for real-time predictions to help advertisers optimize ad placements and revenue strategies.
